name: Ducktonic Adventures
description:
Sinopsis

Follow a group of color blind ducks in their adventure to get Nick Dalton's glasses, an ancient relic that will free them from all their problems. 

Ducktonic Adventures is a cooperative multiplayer game, where two players trapped in a dungeon have to collaborate in order to escape. The key to success will be the collaboration between them, because each player sees objects that other players can not see, and must cooperate to help each other to solve the puzzles.  

For communication with your partner, you can communicate via Discord, within the game, there is the possibility to talk to your partner via Quacks, to facilitate cooperation.

Made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2022

Awarded with the Innovation Award  🏆💡 Controls

There is an option to see the controls in game. It will change automatically to keyboard or controller depending on your last input.

Keyboard :

  • Move -> A/W/S/D 
  • Jump -> Space
  • Cuak -> E
  • Angry Quack -> Q

Controller :

  • Move -> Joystick
  • Jump -> A/ X
  • Quack -> RB 
  • Angry Quack -> LB
How to play with your friends You do need to either port-forward 7777 or enable Upnp on your router to *HOST* any game. You should be able to join any game without doing any of this. Just remember to allow the app when promped by the firewall on windows or Windows Defender!<span></span> Credits
